column4: I have monitor, keyboard, mouse and all that....just looking for PC.  Also I have a pci-e card (nvidia 7600 gs) I would pop in if it is better than integrated video that comes with pc.  I would like to spend under 400 dollars canadian......please check out local retailer and tell me what system catches your eye in my price range at http://www.canadacomputers.com/computers/
I plan on using ubuntu on it
We don't support computer hardware or make recommendations here. You could try asking in ##hardware
I don't suggest trying to continue use of a hard drive despite hardware failure. It's a recipe for disaster.
